snippet: Whole Woman’s Health will reopen a clinic serving poor women in the Rio Grande Valley after a judge ruled that Texas’s new strictures were too restrictive.
abstract: Whole Woman's Health abortion clinic in McAllen, Tex, will reopen following favorable decision by Federal Judge Lee Yeakel, who ruled that key parts of state's 2013 abortion law were unconstitutional; clinic was last provider of abortions in vast Rio Grande Valley when state restrictions forced it to shut down in the fall of 2013.
lead_paragraph: Whole Woman’s Health will reopen a clinic serving poor women in the Rio Grande Valley after a judge ruled that Texas’s new strictures were too restrictive.

headline.main: Texas Abortion Clinic to Reopen After Ruling
headline.print_headline: Texas Abortion Clinic to Reopen After Ruling
